newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore merchant fleet tops 17 mln gross tons.
newsitem.headline: Singapore merchant fleet tops 17 mln gross tons.

text.p: Singapore said on Monday its merchant fleet this month passed the 17 million gross registered tons (grt) mark for the first time.

Singapore's Maritime and Port Authority (MPA) said in a statement the 17 million grt mark was just exceeded on October 17 with the registration of the 9,074-ton Hailong Maritime Ptd Ltd vessel, 'Aconcagua'.
The MPA said it was the second time this year Singapore had added a million grt to its fleet. It exceeded 15 million grt in December 1995.
Shipping industry monitor Lloyd's Register's World Fleet Statistics said Singapore had the world's 11th largest merchant fleet at the end of 1995.
Singapore's fleet has grown about 10 percent a year since 1989, the MPA said.
